snippet: The jury in the trial of a man accused of trying to protect the Boston Marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev will resume deliberations on Monday after being dismissed Thursday afternoon when a juror became ill.
abstract: Jury in trial of Azamat Tazhayakov, man accused of trying to protect Boston Marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, is poised to resume deliberations after being dismissed for few days when juror became ill.
lead_paragraph: The jury in the trial of a man accused of trying to protect the Boston Marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev will resume deliberations on Monday after being dismissed Thursday afternoon when a juror became ill.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Deliberations Delayed in Case Related to Marathon Bombing
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Deliberations Delayed in Case Related to Marathon Bombing
